protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Transcriptional activator, probably constitutive, which binds to the cAMP-responsive element (CRE) (consensus:5'- GTGACGT[AC][AG]-3'), a sequence present in many viral and cellular promoters. Interaction with JUN redirects JUN to bind to CRES preferentially over the 12-O-tetradecanoylphorbol-13-acetate response elements (TRES) as part of an ATF2/JUN complex

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
